oldConfigLines = ['misc,height 20\n', '\n', 'line2\n']
newMax = 10
percentMagnitude = 90
checkVectors = False
newConfig = oommfconvert.replaceConfigLines(oldConfigLines, newMax,
    percentMagnitude, checkVectors)
expectedNewline = '    misc,height 18.0\n'
self.assertEqual(newConfig, [expectedNewline, '\n', 'line2\n'])
